Our Governors meet regularly and many visit school during the day to support the work of school leaders or to help in class, during visits or at special events. Three of our Governors are linked directly to the Parent Council, a further group of representative parents, who provide vital, regular and constructive feedback to school leaders.

We have 12 Governors at present:

Mrs K Thorogood- Chair of Governors

Miss C Throssell- Vice-Chair and Safeguarding Governor

Mr L McClure- Headteacher

Mrs N Exley- Staff Governor

Mrs  Kelly- Parent Governor

Mr R Flectcher

Dr M Parker
